review: the first 34 chapters werent as bad as i thought in regard to pixel hunting but the last two chapters felt very unintuitive and it felt like there was a lot more pixel hunting theres also a severe performance drop in one of the chapters as its an old game theres a guide with a fix for it the story is not as interesting as the first part but id still recommend it as a whole 3part package
